# LATEX

- File extensions:

## Mega-linter configuration

| Variable | Description | Default value |
| ----------------- | -------------- | -------------- |
| LATEX_FILTER_REGEX_INCLUDE | Custom regex including filter |  |
| LATEX_FILTER_REGEX_EXCLUDE | Custom regex excluding filter |  |
